A data transfer object (DTO) representing a single filter option for device filtering operations, including the filter value, display label, and count of matching devices.

## Key Components

- **DeviceFilterItem**: Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for automatic getter/setter generation and builder pattern support
- **value**: The actual filter value used in API requests (e.g., "online", "offline")  
- **label**: Human-readable display text for UI components (e.g., "Online", "Offline")
- **count**: Number of devices that match this specific filter criteria

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating a device filter item using the builder pattern
DeviceFilterItem filterItem = DeviceFilterItem.builder()
    .value("online")
    .label("Online")
    .count(42)
    .build();

// Using in a REST API response for device filtering UI
List<DeviceFilterItem> statusFilters = Arrays.asList(
    DeviceFilterItem.builder().value("online").label("Online").count(15).build(),
    DeviceFilterItem.builder().value("offline").label("Offline").count(8).build(),
    DeviceFilterItem.builder().value("maintenance").label("Under Maintenance").count(3).build()
);

// Accessing properties
String filterValue = filterItem.getValue();        // "online"
String displayLabel = filterItem.getLabel();       // "Online"
Integer deviceCount = filterItem.getCount();       // 42
```

This class is typically used in REST API responses to provide filtering options with associated counts, enabling dynamic filter UI generation with real-time device statistics.
